snippet.title: Anna: The Magic of Words | A new game for your beloved Famicom machine! (Game trailer)
snippet.description:
Game development in progress.

Backstory of the game:
The magic of words gave you everything and suddenly took everything from you.
A little sad and disappointed you make your way through a dangerous world. Embark on the difficult journey through the jungle, icy landscapes and dangerous caves. Collect scrolls and combine their words, face your fear and the ticking clock.
But whatever happens, never forget your most important goal: find Anna.

Further information:
https://www.eastpixel.de/anna

Game development in progress.
https://www.eastpixel.de/anna

ANNA (アンナ) IS A GAME BY EASTPIXEL.
Developed to run on the Nintendo® Family Computer/Nintendo® Entertainment System.  
Nintendo Family Computer and Nintendo® Entertainment System are trademarks of Nintendo®.
